A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was complete garbage. They basically killed the legacy of the earlier films/characters. The humor was tragically out of place for a Star Wars film. The action wasn't that thrilling. The film seemed Bipolar. There was no fluidity to it at all. By the end of the Film. I actually wanted the rebellion to be over\, so I wouldn't have to endure hearing or reading about this franchise. Well done Disney.....Not.
